name: expo-ondevice-ai
description: Expo module for on-device AI using Locanara SDK

scripts.lint:kt: sh -c 'command -v ktlint >/dev/null 2>&1 && ktlint --format ./android || { echo "ktlint not installed; skipping"; exit 0; }'
scripts.lint:ci: bun run lint:tsc && bun run lint:eslint && bun run lint:prettier && bun run lint:kt
scripts.prepare: expo-module prepare && sh -c 'command -v husky >/dev/null 2>&1 && husky install || { echo "husky not installed; skipping"; exit 0; }'
scripts.example:mac: cd example && bun run ios -- --device "My Mac"
scripts.example:prebuild:ios: cd example && bunx expo prebuild --platform ios --clean
scripts.example:prebuild:android: cd example && bunx expo prebuild --platform android --clean
scripts.example:fresh:ios: bun run example:prebuild:ios && bun run example:ios --
scripts.example:fresh:android: bun run example:prebuild:android && bun run example:android

author: hyochan <hyochan.dev@gmail.com> (https://github.com/hyochan)
